scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/franc.spec.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-benchmark && npm run lint-style
scripts.lint-api: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js lib/franc.js --env node --env browser --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.lint-script: node_modules/.bin/eslint script/languages.js script/build-fixtures.js script/build-data.js script/build-support.js script/build-languages.js --env node --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.lint-benchmark: node_modules/.bin/eslint benchmark/index.js --env node --global 'suite, bench, set' --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.lint-style: node_modules/.bin/jscs index.js lib/franc.js script/languages.js script/build-data.js script/build-fixtures.js script/build-support.js script/build-languages.js benchmark/index.js spec/franc.spec.js --reporter=inline
scripts.prepublish: npm run build-data && npm run build-fixtures && npm run build-languages && npm run build-support
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
